tasks.name: Define Ping Target
tasks.objective: Identify the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to determine the appropriate target for the ping.
Document the chosen target for future reference.
acceptance: Target is clearly defined and agreed upon by stakeholders.
risks: Choosing an incorrect target may lead to misleading results.
mitigations: Engage with multiple stakeholders to validate the target choice.

tasks.name: Outline Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and content requirements for the repository report.
actions: Gather input from users on what details they expect in the report.
Create a template for the report based on user feedback.
acceptance: Report format and content are approved by users.
risks: Insufficient details in the report may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on the report template based on user reviews.

notes: These tasks focus on clarifying the ambiguities around the ping target and report requirements to ensure successful execution of the user's intent.
